import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { products } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'], }) export class ProductListComponent { products = products; share(product : {link : string}) { window.open("https://telegram.me/share/url?url=" + product.link) } } /* Copyright Google LLC. All Rights Reserved. Use of this source code is governed by an MIT-style license that can be found in the LICENSE file at https://angular.io/license */

Rating : {{product.rating}}
